item.description:
Now that the Patriots wont be playing on Super Bowl Sunday, come spend that afternoon with a winter hike in Myles Standish State Forest.  We will walk through the center of the forest in Wildlife Management areas.  The hike will include a mix of trail and forest road walking through some of the lesser used areas of the park.  The route will be moderately hilly in places, will pass by some ponds, numerous fields and both white pine and pine barren habitats. Dogs are welcome if they are leashed on the narrow trail portions of the hike.
 
I expect the hike to be 2+ hours and five mile range if walking conditions are good.  If there is enough snow, we can make it a snowshoe hike and I will adjust the hike route accordingly.  I will send out a follow-up note several days prior to the hike.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: February First Sunday Hike
